content.question: Which of the following is a limitation of using only the data in the table to complete an ecological footprint analysis of the different students?

choices.label: The footprint for each individual is based on simple calculations to determine approximate resource use.
The footprint uses a top-down approach to provide a complete picture of resource use for comparison between individuals.
The footprint uses global hectares, rather than hectares, to determine the approximate proportion of Earthâ€™s surface needed to support the activities of an individual.
The footprint is a static analysis and does not include all environmental impacts of an individual.

content.answer: The footprint is a static analysis and does not include all environmental impacts of an individual.
